MajorClaims.Text: life in a city is much better than life in the countryside
living in the city is much better nowadays

Claims.Text: in the city there is much better education system
city provides more work opportunities than the countryside
in the urban areas there are also more citizens what means, that the culture diversity is huge
in the countryside there are many places to rest, because of its location

Premises.Text: the schools and the universities have well equipped classes and the famous professors would like to work in such places
There are not only more jobs, but they are also well-paid
living in a city is more expensive
Meeting and knowing new people's tradition is an unforgettable experience, which could influence on one's previous habits
the city has well-organised lines of transport
The buses and trains are more frequent than in the countryside
peaceful and close to the nature areas could help to avoid worries and sadness
